channel.title: keyboard on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in keyboard on Joost Plattel

item.title: Wearable keyboard prototypes
item.description: As I’ve highlighted in previous posts, a wearable keyboard is one of my main projects this month. In this post I want to show you some pictures of the first prototypes and tell you a bit more about the proces of designing a keyboard. Remember I’ve got really no experience on ergonomics or knowledge about user-interface, I mostly go by feel here as it’s a highly personalized product (for now!).

item.title: Making a bluetooth Sudoku keyboard
item.description: My girlfriend loves to solves sudoku’s and most of the time she’s doing so on her iPhone.. As a belated birthday gift I made her a custom sudoku-keyboard with just 9 keys. Who needs more if you just want to do a sudoku right? This was a perfect opportunity for me to dive some more into hardware and especially bluetooth things… The entire body is 3D printed and has threaded inserts with M3 screws and basic keycaps.
